newspaper_data.title: Oscar Brown Jr to Sing AKA Benefit
newspaper_data.entry: On June 11, 1964, the Los Angeles Sentinel reported on the Eta Lambda Omega chapter of the Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority selecting jazz singer and civil rights activist Oscar Brown, Jr., to perform at the Hollywood Palladium located at 6215 Sunset Boulevard for a scholarship fundraiser. Alpha Kappa Alpha is the first intercollegiate historically African American sorority.

newspaper_data.title: Palladium New Policy: Nix on Rap
newspaper_data.entry: On September 16, 1993, the Los Angeles Sentinel reported on the stricter body search measures and ban on rap and heavy metal concerts from the new management team of Hollywood Palladium located at 6215 Sunset Boulevard. Palladium president Alan Shuman did not believe his decision to not book musicians with “divisive and incendiary material” was discriminatory as it was “an exclusionary policy of a particular type of music, not of a particular ethnic group.” He goes further to make clear the Palladium still has rhythm and blues concerts, jazz concerts, and reggae concerts. City Councilwoman Jackie Goldberg supported these new security measures.

newspaper_data.title: Black History Month Events
newspaper_data.entry: On February 22, 1996, the Los Angeles Sentinel listed upcoming Black History Month events, one of which was the upcoming Ebony Fashion Fair that was to be held Easter Sunday at the Hollywood Palladium located at 6215 Sunset Boulevard. This event was to be presented by the Lullaby Guild, an auxiliary of the Children’s Home Society dedicated to helping African American children without permanent families.

newspaper_data.title: Tribute Slated for L. Bohler
newspaper_data.entry: On January 15, 1981, the Los Angeles Sentinel wrote of an upcoming tribute for Reverend Canon Lewis P. Bohler, Jr., to be held at the Hollywood Palladium, located at 6215 Sunset Boulevard. According to the Los Angeles Sentinel, he was to be honored for his “untiring efforts as a crusader for human rights.” Not only was he a volunteer coordinator at the Mount Vernon Junior High School and a member of the California School Board, he was also a member of the NAACP and the National Urban League.

newspaper_data.title: Trofeos a unos mecánicos en el Palladium [= Trophies to some mechanics at the Palladium]
newspaper_data.entry: Three members of the Los Angeles Trade-Technical College receive awards for their performance in a mechanical competition held at the Hollywood Palladium (6215 Sunset Boulevard), in collaboration with Riverside Motor Trend.

newspaper_data.title: Gran interes por asistir esta noche al Hollywood Palladium [= Great interest in attending the Hollywood Palladium tonight]
newspaper_data.entry: Artists perform at the "Lovers Dance," an event organized for the Latin American public of Los Angeles, held at the Hollywood Palladium (6215 Sunset Boulevard).

newspaper_data.title: Animacion por el gran baile del Palladium [= Liveliness for the great dance at the Palladium]
newspaper_data.entry: This article discusses the shared excitement between Colombian and Mexican communities in Los Angeles for an upcoming event at the Palladium (6215 Sunset Boulevard).

newspaper_data.title: Sonia López actuará hoy en el Palladium [=Sonia López will act today in the Palladium]
newspaper_data.entry: This article describes growing excitement for a dance event in which artist Sonia López will perform at the Hollywood Palladium (6215 Sunset Boulevard).

newspaper_data.title: "La Sonora Santanera" encabeza hoy un gran baile en el Palladium [="La Sonoroa Santanera" headlines a great dance at the Palladium today]
newspaper_data.entry: In anticipation of Memorial Day, multiple artists perform at an event, headlined by "La Sonora Santanera," in the Hollywood Palladium (6215 Sunset Boulevard).

newspaper_data.title: Marathon de baile hoy en el Palladium de Hollywood [= Dancing marathon today at the Hollywood Palladium]
newspaper_data.entry: This article announces an 11-hour dance marathon organized by the company Main Show to be held at the Hollywood Palladium (6215 Sunset Boulevard).

newspaper_data.title: Hoy se inicia en el Palladium la Feria Mexicana de Artesanías [= The Mexican Handicraft Fair begins at the Palladium today]
newspaper_data.entry: This article describes the festivities flooding Sunset Boulevard in anticipation for the Mexican Handicraft Fair at the Hollywood Palladium (6215 Sunset).

newspaper_data.title: Los Terricoias y "Los Angeles Negros" en gran baile aqui [= Los Terricoias and "Los Angeles Negros" in a great dance]
newspaper_data.entry: Los Terricoias and "Los Angeles Negros" perform at the Hollywood Palladium (6215).

newspaper_data.title: Baile en el Palladium, desde las cuatro, hoy [= Dance at the Palladium today at 4]
newspaper_data.entry: This article announces a dance marathon at the Hollywood Palladium (6215), described as a popular and well known venue.

newspaper_data.title: Atractivo baile en el Hollywood Palladium [= Alluring dance at the Hollywood Palladium]
newspaper_data.entry: Various groups perform for a dance at the Hollywood Palladium (6215), including "El Gran Combo," whose history is detailed extensively.

newspaper_data.title: Iris Chacón no llenó el Palladium como se esperaba [= Iris Chacón did not perform as expected at the Palladium]
newspaper_data.entry: Iris Chacón's show at the Palladium (6215) did not receive the publicity or the success its promoters had hoped for.

newspaper_data.title: Los 8 de Colombia amenizarán baile, mañana en el Hollywood Palladium [= The 8 from Colombia will enliven the dance at the Hollywood Palladium tomorrow]
newspaper_data.entry: Los 8 de Colombia performs at the Hollywood Palladium (6215 Sunset).

newspaper_data.title: David Valentín y Azuquita actuarán hoy en el Hollywood Palladium [= David Valentín and Azuquita will perform today at the Hollywood Palladium]
newspaper_data.entry: This article briefly recounts David Valentín and Azuquita's artistic histories and announces their appearance at the Palladium (6215).

newspaper_data.title: Olga Guillot, el bolero convertido en mujer, este sábado en el Hollywood Palladium [= Olga Guillot, the bolero turned into a woman, this Saturday at the Hollywood Palladium]
newspaper_data.entry: Olga Guillot performs at the Hollywood Palladium (6215).

newspaper_data.title: El Hollywood Palladium volvera a presentar funciones de boxeo [= The Hollywood Palladium will continue to present boxing matches]
newspaper_data.entry: The Hollywood Palladium (6215) reopens its doors to host professional boxing matches.

newspaper_data.title: Ahora o nunca, para Arredondo y Pat Lawlor [= Now or never, for Arredondo and Pat Lawlor]
newspaper_data.entry: The match between René Arrendondo and Pat Lawlor marks the return of professional boxing to the Hollywood Palladium (6215).

newspaper_data.title: Hollywood Palladium recupera su esplendor [= Hollywood Palladium regains its splendor]
newspaper_data.entry: An agreement is reached to renovate the Hollywood Palladium (6215), after rapid economic development in the area and an announcement for the sale of the block on which the venue stands made the future of the landmark uncertain.

social_cultural_data.entry: Significant sites of "musical memories" on Sunset Boulevard
